      Method to drop the food, and thus place it into a valid position.
      double IFacade.getRadius(Food food)
      Returns the radius of the given food ration (For single-student groups that do not implement food, this method may return any value)

      double IFacade.getX(Food food)

      Returns whether or not the given food ration is alive (active), i.e., not eaten.
